mapper.select: SELECT a.infrCcSeq ,a.infrCcNameKor ,a.infrCcNameEng ,a.infrCodeGroupSeq ,b.infrCcgSeq FROM infrCode a join infrCodeGroup b on a.infrCodeGroupSeq = b.infrCcgSeq WHERE 1=1 AND infrCcDelNy = 1 AND infrCcUseNy = 0

SELECT a.infrCcSeq ,(SELECT infrCcgNameKor FROM infrCodeGroup aa WHERE 1=1 AND aa.infrCcgSeq = a.infrCodeGroupSeq)as infrCcgNameKor ,a.infrCcNameKor ,a.infrCcNameEng ,a.infrCcDelNy ,a.infrCcUseNy ,a.regDatetime
ORDER BY a.infrCcSeq DESC
SELECT infrCcNameKor ,infrCcNameEng ,infrCcUseNy ,infrCcDelNy ,regDateTime ,infrCodeGroupSeq FROM infrCode WHERE 1=1 AND infrCcSeq = #{infrCcSeq}
